text: Johnny Lyons (15 January 1876 - 30 July 1910) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Johnny Lyons's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1876 births Category:1910 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Johnny Lyons (footballer)
